comments.en:
Multifunction device, based on Lexmark printing mechanism.

Try these drivers: lm5000, lxm5700, lxm3200, pbm2l2030, pbm2l7k.

The Lexmark 5700 driver runs it in bw only; Mike Maddux offered a report of this working, even "through" a parallel Zip drive.

Consumables/Refills: Color and black cartridge
